main event: On June 7, 1954, two observers reported seeing a bright, glowing, oval-shaped object moving slowly across the sky near Linconville, Illinois.
interesting points: The object was estimated to be 25-30 feet in diameter, The object hovered for several minutes before suddenly disappearing from view, The sighting took place at approximately 8:30 PM, The investigation was conducted by the United States Air Force under Project Blue Book, The observers were certain that the object was not an aircraft or known man-made object.
sighted object: bright, oval-shaped object surrounded by a halo of light
witness description: Mr. John Doe and another observer
